roleset.name: natural disaster: pacific tropical cyclone
roleset.note: TYPHOON-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to hurricane, cyclone, twister, tornado. (from typhoon.01-n)

roles.note: The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.

example.name: typhoon-n: arg2
example.text: Although Morakot was only a moderate intensity typhoon at landfall, it was a large and relatively slow-moving storm
